entries.title: Industrial espionage: How China sneaks out America's technology secrets
entries.description: The true extent of commercial spying is unknown but experts say it is "pervasive".

entries.title: Taliban start buying blue ticks on Twitter
entries.description: Prominent officials have bought ticks which used to indicate notable accounts verified by Twitter.

entries.title: Twitter: Five ways Elon Musk has changed the platform for users
entries.description: Twitter users say the social network has "a different vibe" since the billionaire took charge.
